node.title: Families 'floored' as pair of Secret Santas pay off 82 Christmas lay-bys at toyshop
node.alt: A man standing in a toyshop.
node.description: The couple, who wish to remain anonymous, told the manager of the store that they had vowed to perform such an act of kindness after struggling to pay the bills during their younger years.
node.content:
["A pair of\u00a0anonymous donors have brought joy to Bendigo families after paying off 82 Christmas lay-bys early at a local toyshop.", "Store manager Scott Mills said the donation was from a \"quiet and regular\" couple who\u00a0did not want the dollar amount revealed.", "\"In\u00a0their younger years they struggled to pay bills and always said if they got to a point in life where they were financially secure, they wanted to pay it back,\" he said.", "\"They're really good, honest, nice, hardworking people.\"", "Mr Mills said he was moved by some of the stories from customers.\u00a0", "\"One family had $10 left in the bank and it was the child's birthday next week and they couldn't afford to buy anything, and they didn't know what to do about it,\" he said.", "", "
Rachel Woodman\u00a0burst into tears when she found out Ava's gifts had been paid for.(Supplied)
", "
'Just so grateful'
", "Anthea Laurie said she was \"floored\" when she found out\u00a0presents for her 11-month-old daughter, and her sons, three and 16, had been paid off.", "\"When the woman called from Toyworld, I thought I'd missed the fortnightly payment,\" Ms Laurie said.", "\"But then she told me, 'We have some good news and a Secret Santa had popped in.'", "\"I was\u00a0holding back the tears and trying to concentrate on driving at the same time.\"", "Long Gully mother Rachel Woodman\u00a0said she still had to pay off $20 a fortnight until Christmas for the dolls and a makeup kit she was going to give her\u00a0four-year-old daughter, Ava.", "\"I started crying,\" Ms Woodman said.", "\"It's just lovely what they've done \u2014 I'm just so grateful.", "\"When I put it on lay-by, I didn't have that much money and there was a sale on, so I thought, 'If I do it now, I can pay it off for my daughter.'\"", "", "
Anthea Laurie no longer has to worry about making the payments on the presents for her three kids.(Supplied)
", "
Paying it forward
", "Ms Laurie hopes to use some of the money she has saved to help others.", "\"I will go back to the shop and buy a toy to put under a Christmas donation tree for less fortunate families,\" she said.", "\"That's my way of paying it forward \u2014 never in my wildest dreams will I be in a position to do what this couple has done though."]
